word_mean: 先露：在产科指胎儿纵轴与母体纵轴的关系

sentence.Network_en: Usually, the presentation is made on the other side of the pond.
sentence.Network_cn: 通常，这样的展示是在大西洋另一边进行的。

sentence.Network_en: Then came the presentation of the awards by the Queen Mother.

的礼品(present)，它承载着文化的规则（礼节）并牵涉到仪式。所以，无礼之物就只是物品而不是礼物。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: via Old French from late Latin praesentatio(n-), from Latin praesentare 'place before' (see present)

entry.def: Presentation is the appearance of something, which someone has worked to create.

example.ex: We serve  traditional French food cooked in a lighter way, keeping the presentation simple...
example.tran: 我们供应制作清淡、样式简洁的传统法国菜肴。

example.ex: Check the presentation. Get it properly laid out with a title page.
example.tran: 检查一下外观，保证有扉页和合适的版式。

entry.def: A presentation is a formal event at which someone is given a prize or award.

example.ex: He received his award at a presentation in London yesterday.
example.tran: 昨天，他在伦敦的颁奖典礼上领了奖。

entry.def: When someone gives a presentation, they give a formal talk, often in order to sell something or get support for a proposal.

example.ex: James Watson, Philip Mayo and I gave a slide and video presentation...
example.tran: 詹姆斯·沃森、菲利普·梅奥和我利用幻灯片和视频进行了介绍。

example.ex: I always ask how much time I have to make my presentation.
example.tran: 我总是问我的报告需要做多长时间。

entry.def: A presentation is something that is performed in front of an audience, for example a play or a ballet.

example.ex: ...Blackpool Opera House's presentation of Buddy, the musical.
example.tran: 布莱克浦歌剧院上演的音乐剧《朋友》

means.word_mean: 1. the activity of formally presenting something (as a prize or reward);

sentences.sentence: "she gave the trophy but he made the presentation"

means.word_mean: 2. the act of making something publicly available; presenting news or other information by broadcasting or printing it;

sentences.sentence: "he prepared his presentation carefully in advance"

means.word_mean: 3. a show or display; the act of presenting something to sight or view;
4. the act of presenting a proposal
6. formally making a person known to another or to the public
7. (obstetrics) position of the fetus in the uterus relative to the birth canal;

sentences.sentence: "Cesarean sections are sometimes the result of abnormal presentations"

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表名词,"行为,过程,结果"; 2. 注：如果加在y结尾的单词后通常为去掉y加上ication.

stems_affixes.word_buile: revoc=revoke废除+ation行为,过程,结果→n.废弃,取消

stems_affixes.value_cn: 结合,联合;化合;团体;组合数码
stems_affixes.word_buile: combine联合+ation行为,过程,结果→n.结合,联合;化合;团体;组合数码
confirm证实+ation行为,过程,结果→n.证实,确定;确认
determine决心+ation行为,过程,结果→n.决心;决定;确定
excite使兴奋+ation行为,过程,结果→n.刺激;激动;激发
exclaim叫喊;感叹+ation行为,过程,结果→n.叫喊;感叹
ex出去+plan明白+ation行为,过程,结果→使其明白→解释,解说
generalize一般的+ation行为,过程,结果→n.一般化;概括,综合

stems_affixes.value_cn: 想象[力];空想,幻觉;想象出来的事物
stems_affixes.word_buile: imagine设想+ation行为,过程,结果→n.想象[力];空想,幻觉;想象出来的事物

stems_affixes.value_cn: 倾斜,弯曲,倾度,倾向,爱好
stems_affixes.word_buile: incline倾斜;偏向+ation行为,过程,结果→n.倾斜,弯曲,倾度,倾向,爱好
lament悲伤,哀悼+ation行为,过程,结果→n.悲痛,哀悼,痛哭
limit限制+ation行为,过程,结果→n.限制,局限性
oblige迫使,责成+ation行为,过程,结果→n.义务,责任
present赠送+ation行为,过程,结果→n.介绍;赠送;呈现
provoc=provoke激怒+ation行为,过程,结果→n.激怒
recommend赞扬;推荐+ation行为,过程,结果→n.推荐,介绍[信],劝告,建议
represent描述,表示+ation行为,过程,结果→n.描写;陈述;代表

stems_affixes.value_cn: 保留,保留意见;预定,预订
stems_affixes.word_buile: reserve保留,储备;预定+ation行为,过程,结果→reservation保留
starve使饿死+ation行为,过程,结果→n.饥饿

Sentence.sentence: Today's presentation will show how we see the development of the motor car in the short to medium term, and that is why we have invited all of you here today.
What is the presentation mainly about
After outlining the main points she would cover, she assured the audience that she would be happy to answer questions at the end of her presentation.
What is the focus of Delia Sedona's presentation
I don't think we have enough information for our presentation.

sentences.en: On presentation of the relevant identity documents you may collect your property.
sentences.cn: 你只要出示有关的身份证件就可以领取你的财产。

sentences.en: The presentation of food can be as important as the taste.
sentences.cn: 食物的外观和味道同样重要。

sentences.en: The Queen will make the presentation herself.
His presentation was clear and incisive.
Last week we went to the presentation of a new play.
sentences.cn: 上星期我们去观看了一场新剧的演出。

jushi.english: On presentation of the relevant identity documents you may collect your property.
jushi.chinese: 你只要出示有关的身份证件就可以领取你的财产。

jushi.english: The Queen will make the presentation herself.
Last week we went to the presentation of a new play.
jushi.chinese: 上星期我们去观看了一部新剧的演出。
